pubinfo.publish: National Center for Earth-surface Dynamics Data Repository

descript.abstract: They all are 1x1 meter grid resolution, using UTM, zone 10, NAD83 projection. These are ESRI grids. 1. Bare-earth DEM: eel1mdem 2. Canopy DEM: eel1mcanopy 3. Vegetation Heights, i.e. the difference between the bare earth and canopy: eel1mdiff Data was flown for the purposes of improving algorithms for LIDAR bare-earth processing and to be the basis of interdisciplinary geology, ecology, hydrology modelling as performed by the National Center for Earth-surface Dynamics. NCALM, University of Florida flew the LIDAR and processed it to 9column ascii files. They also created the bare-earth DEM. NCALM, UC Berkeley processed the canopy and veg heights DEMs and is responsible for distribution.

idinfo.accconst: You are free to download and use data from the NCED Data Repository providing you register, and include the citation below for all datasets. Where an additional citation accompanies a specific data set, please include it as well. Citation: National Center for Earth-surface Dynamics Data Repository http://www.nced.umn.edu/Data_Repository.html [add date you accessed the data]

cntperp.cntorg: Power Lab, Department of Integrative Biology, University of California, Berkeley

idinfo.datacred: National Center for Airborn Laser Mapping (NCALM), University of California, Berkeley and University of Florida
